valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Wed 4 Feb 2026 to 12:00 (UTC) on Thu 5 Feb 2026
general_synopsis: Low FitzRoy 971 expected Plymouth 970 by 0600 tomorrow

Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 until later. In northeast, southeasterly 4 to 6, occasionally 7 at first and 3 later.
Sea state
In southwest, very rough or high, becoming rough or very rough. in northeast, rough or very rough at first in northeast, otherwise moderate or rough.
Weather
In southwest, sleet or snow. In northeast, fair.
Visibility
In southwest, moderate to very poor. In northeast, good.
Viking.gale_warning:
Gale warning
Issued:
15:48 (UTC) on Wed 4 Feb 2026
Southeasterly severe gale force 9 decreasing gale force 8 soon

Viking.visibility: In southwest, moderate to very poor. In northeast, good.
